content.query:
CREATE TABLE #StageCustomers(
    [Customer_Name] VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    [Phone] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[Address_Line1] VARCHAR(100) NULL,
	[Address_Line2] VARCHAR(100) NULL,
	[City] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[State] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[Postal_Code] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[Country] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[Territory] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[Contact_Lastname] VARCHAR(20) NULL,
	[Conact_Firstname] VARCHAR(20) NULL
)

SELECT *
FROM #StageCustomers


COPY INTO #Sales.dimCustomers 
from 'https://stcgcasestudy.dfs.core.windows.net/root/Sales_Transformed/dimCustomers.csv'
with(
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    IDENTITY_INSERT= 'OFF',
    FIRSTROW = 2
)


SELECT *
FROM Sales.dimCustomers



INSERT INTO #Sales.dimCustomers ([Customer_Name],
    [Phone] ,
	[Address_Line1] ,
	[Address_Line2] ,
	[City] ,
	[State],
	[Postal_Code] ,
	[Country] ,
	[Territory] ,
	[Contact_Lastname] ,
	[Conact_Firstname] )
from 'https://stcgcasestudy.dfs.core.windows.net/root/Sales_Transformed/dimCustomers.csv'
with(
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    IDENTITY_INSERT= 'OFF',
    FIRSTROW = 2
)




















CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Hera@123'

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SalesCRED
WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE SalesExSource
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'https://stcgcasestudy.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = SalesCRED
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT SalesExfileF WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS(
        FIRST_ROW = 1
    )
)


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Sales.ExCustomers WITH(
    LOCATION = 'root/Sales_ExternalFiles',
    DATA_SOURCE = SalesExSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = SalesExfileF
)AS
SELECT *
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://stcgcasestudy.dfs.core.windows.net/root/Sales_Transformed/dimCustomers.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
) AS ExternalCustomers
